page.title: 11SCHOOL MEALS 1985
page.content:
Our school has it's own kitchen. Some years ago it used to prepare meals. Today the food is prepared at another school and brought to us in large metal boxes. The kitchen staff then serve out the food to us. We eat our meals off a special plastic tray, we also get a choice of menu. Here is a typical menu. Spaghetti Bolognaise, Potatoes, carrots, Jam sponge, sauce.
Fish cakes, chips, peas, scone, milkshake.
Chicken pie, potatoes, cabbage, gravy, instant dessert.
Beefburger, chips, baked beans, fruit crumble.
